snippet.title: Gardening, Friends & Mysteries! || GOLEMBERT Devlog #00
snippet.description:
Welcome to the introductory video (aka Devlog 00) for our cozy Gardening game project Golembert! We hope you like the video ♥️

If you have any questions or suggestions for what you would like to see from our game development process, you can comment on this video or write us via any other social media linked below 🍓🌿 

_Social Media_______________________

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2455710/Golembert/
Website: https://studiofirlefanz.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/studiofirlefanz
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/studiofirlefanz/
Tumblr: https://studiofirlefanz.tumblr.com/
Reddit: https://studiofirlefanz.tumblr.com/

_Credit_____________________________
the Music used in this video is by: 
https://www.youtube.com/@UC6YNH6OQo6Ak_alVXZ9NzfQ 


_Chapters__________________________
0:00 Intro
0:06 Hello & Welcome
0:50 About Us
2:11 About Golembert
2:48 Game Mechanics
4:28 Artstyle
5:43 Current State
6:32 Next Steps
6:45 Thank you & Outro

#devlog #indiegamedev #2dgame #cozygames #gamedev
